content: from the website pretty crochet afghan pattern as featured on the pbs show the needlearts studio stitched in moda dea cherish for exceptional softness >the website was closed archived link provided visit the link and scroll down skill level intermediate moda dea® cherish™ art r160 3 5 oz/280 yard balls 8 balls 5762 ocean options moda dea® baby talk™ art r158 3 5 oz/257 yard balls crochet hooks 5mm us h-8 and 5 5mm us i-9 yarn needle finished measurement 40 x 51 worked in pattern 16 sts = 5 16 row = 5
